Key Match Events: Mets fell into a 1-1 series deficit after losing Game 1 of the NLCS.
Kodai Senga struggled with his mechanics and performance, allowing the Dodgers to take control early.
Dodgers' bullpen pitched 33 consecutive scoreless innings, matching a postseason record.
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor expressed frustration about the team's performance.
Kodai Senga was determined to improve for the next game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the Mets' first loss in the postseason.
The game marked the Dodgers' dominance in the early stages of the series.
